short_summary: Supply, delivery and installation of DC capacitors and UPS batteries for Galaxy 5000 UPS
description: JC Wilt Infections Diseases Research Centre
tags: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) }(shortened tag name)
full_summary:
**Tender Title:** Capacitors and Batteries for JT Wilt Infections Diseases Research Centre

**Reference Number:** WS3945056576-Doc3945110078
**Solicitation Number:** WS3945056576

**Publication Date:** April 5, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** May 1, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFQ)

**Notice Description:** The JT Wilt Infections Diseases Research Centre requires the supply, delivery and installation of Direct Current (DC) capacitors and Uninterrupted Power Supply (UPS) batteries for a Galaxy 5000 UPS.

**Key Information:**

* Procurement category: Goods and Services
* UNSPSC classification: 32121500 (Capacitors)
* Procurement method: Competitive, Open Bidding
* Selection criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Regions of delivery: Manitoba

**Contracting Entity:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC) (elle-la/she-her)
* Email: oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Phone: Not available

**Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15914921?extsite=MTU5MTQ5MjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: Any bid submission received after 1400 EDT on April 24, 2023 will be considered non-responsive.

Please make sure to respond to this notice to be considered for this opportunity. You can find more information on the contract notice at the URL provided above. The tender closing date is May 1, 2023.
